phrases: humanity suddenly found itself faced with a new predator.
They were far more powerful than humans.
Humanity was immediately pushed to the brink of extinction.
There, they enjoyed a century of peace.
That Day The Fall of Zhiganshina (2)
For till then I was a soul in misery, alienate
From God, and covetous of all earthly things;
Such cleansing from the taint of avarice
What canst thou more, who hast subdued our blood
So wholly to thyself, they feel no care

We were so close to saving my mom...
The reason you could not save your mother
is that you lacked the strength.
The reason I did not fight the Titan
was that I lacked the courage!
Use all ships at the pier for Zhiganshina's evacuation!
There are small areas that protrude,
like Zhiganshina, all around the wall.
Their purpose is to attract the Titans,
thus reducing the cost and manpower of defending the walls.
Zhiganshina had fulfilled their function, by drawing the Titans to them,
they were forced to evacuate by a single gate.
We are taking as many people as we can!
Eren and Mikasa are not here yet.
Do not talk to them just now.
Going by appearances, it must have been bad.
Why are you just standing there?
They are right in front of us!
Oh God, oh God, oh God...
Please, at least take my child!
I am sorry, but I cannot!
B-But this thing does not have that kind of accuracy!
Right now, I do not give a crap...
Just load the next she will!
Many people are still in the city!
If they break through this gate,
we will lose more than a single city to the Titans!
We will lose the entire territory within this wall!
But that does not mean we can let these people die!
It is going to ram the wall!
Information We Can Share So Far: Rough Diagram of Human Territory (1) Diagram (see original work) broadly depicts area still inhabited by humans.
Area outside Wall Maria remains a mystery.
Information We Can Share So Far: Rough Diagram of Human Territory (2) Elevation increases with relative proximity to the center of human territory.
Territory is rich in natural resources, such as water, minerals, and natural gas.
Several hours after Zhiganshina's fall on Wall Maria's south side,
Wall Rose, South Side Trost District
Why would walls that have lasted a century fall now?
Whether you believe it or not,
there are people out there who escaped by ship.
At least five hundred, I am told.
The question is if we have lost Zhiganshina alone.
But they would certainly never penetrate Wall Maria, would they?
we should contact the central government and await orders.
an emergency such as this on our own.
They say Wall Maria has been breached!
Humanity will be devoured by Titans again.
Why did I waste my final minutes with her having some stupid argument?!
Is crying all that we can do?!
I will wipe every one of them... off the face of this earth!
That year, the central government decided to fall back within Wall Rose.
During that period of time, the Titans consumed ten thousand people.
What are you trying to do?!
After Mom died, you lost it...
I feel like I saw my dad...
They said they are going to distribute food.
This was once a food storehouse.
They are keeping refugees who fled by ship here.
Hey, do not cut in line!
I have not eaten anything since last night!
It is not yet certain that we will survive.
My grandpa got these for us kids.
There is nothing we can do...
I do not think there is enough food for everyone.
They say that is all we will get today.
And not enough food to begin with.
You know the farther out you live, the less they care, right?
Why do we have to share our food with outsiders?
If the Titans were breaking through anyway,
they should have eaten more, so there would be fewer mouths.
Now there is just that much less food.
What are you doing, stupid kid?
You have never even seen it!
You have never seen the way they eat people...
He is just upset because he is hungry.
That is why he is being so rude to an adult.
The only reason you are not starving is because of us, got it?
Even a kid should show gratitude!
No guy like that is looking after me...
I am going back to Wall Maria.
I am going to kill all the Titans!
Eren, you are not serious, are you?
I am not like them, sitting inside the walls and acting tough!
We cannot win until we can stop depending on stuff from them!
We cannot beat the Titans, anyway.
There is nothing we can do but live within the walls...
If you do something dumb, you will die.
So we should suck up to them instead?
Right now, there is no choice!
Then spend the rest of your life as cattle, weakling!
If Armin is a weakling, so are we.
We did not even run from the Titans or from the city on our own two feet.
We could not even get the food we are eating today without help.
Anyone so weak could not possibly defeat a single Titan...
I will not let you starve.
refugees were sent in droves to till the wastelands,
But even still, there was not enough.
the central government used many refugees
in an operation ostensibly to recover Wall Maria.
Two hundred fifty thousand, in all...
Approximately twenty percent of the population.
But there were only just over a hundred survivors.
Their sacrifice alleviated the food shortage for the rest of us somewhat.
It is all because of the Titans.
I will gain the power to fight Titans!
Mikasa, you do not have to...
Did not you say that it is important to survive?
So I will go, to keep you from dying.
We now begin the enlistment ceremony for the 104th Trainee Corps!
I am Keith Shadis, and I had the misfortune to be assigned
Right now, you are mere cattle, fit for nothing but Titan food!
In three years, we will take you worthless pieces of crap and train you!
Give you the means to fight the Titans.
In three years, when you stand before a Titan,
Or will you be a noble wall, shielding the King?
Or perhaps, one of humanity's glorious soldiers that slay Titans?
That is what I will be.
And I will kill every last Titan in existence!
But when he fails at basic training,
he must confront a harsh reality.
